content.value:
Interesting! Women prefer remote work at a higher rate than men, citing not having to get dressed up and having more flexibility as key reasons. 

This resonates with me a lot - NOT needing to put in 30+ minutes on hair/makeup daily adds up quickly. 

 axios.com/the-gender-div…
